#  UNIVERSEH – European Space University for Earth and Humanity -- UNIVERSEH – European Space University for Earth and Humanity 

URL: https://www.universeh.agh.edu.pl/en/
Crawled: 2025-03-19 21:07:46

Skip to content

Skip to footer

UNIVERSEH – European Space University for Earth and Humanity

"We will create a network of space universities together with partners from Europe. We are starting the second century of AGH University of Krakow with ambitious plans to develop advanced space technologies"

UNIVERSEH
 is a collaborative alliance formed by seven European universities from seven distinct countries, including the AGH University of Krakow. It was established in November 2020 to develop a new way of collaboration in the field of Space within the new “European Universities” initiative promoted by the European Commission. The main goal is to increase the mobility of students and academic staff, as well as to promote interuniversity cooperation.

UNIVERSEH
 aims to introduce innovative educational experiences for university stakeholders and the broader society. This initiative embraces a holistic view of space, encompassing traditional areas like physics and engineering and broadening its scope to include cultural, philosophical, and sustainability considerations.

See the UNIVERSEH website

University of Toulouse
 (Université de Toulouse), France
 – project coordinator

AGH University of Krakow
, Poland

Heinrich Heine University Düsseldorf 
(Heinrich-Heine-Universität Düsseldorf), Germany

Luleå University of Technology
, Sweden

University of Luxembourg
, Luxembourg

University “Tor Vergata” 
(Università degli Studi di Roma Tor Vergata), Italy

University of Namur
, Belgium
